320000.name: MAGIX Movie Edit Pro 2015 Plus
320000.description:
Show the world your best gaming experiences. MAGIX Movie Edit Pro 2015 Plus offers all the functions and tools you need for your video projects. Edit your walkthroughs frame by frame on up to 99 tracks or capture exciting moments of triumph on Let's Play. Native 64-bit support and the proxy editing feature allow beginners and more advanced users to work in studio quality - even on low performance computers. You can also quickly and easily transform footage from family celebrations, vacations and special events into entertaining movies.

The most important features:


  • Includes NewBlue Titler EX worth $199 (Manufacturer's SRP.)
    Professional text animations and captions for your gameplay videos!
  •  Frame-precise video editing on up to 99 tracks
  • Support for the new 4K Ultra HD resolution
  • Create, edit & save 3D videos
  • Proxy editing: Super smooth editing even on low performance computers
  • MultiCam editing for recordings from up to four sources: 
    ideal for Let's Plays - show us what you're playing and what you've got!
  • Advanced audio dubbing in 5.1 surround sound etc.
  • HDR effects for unique contrast values in your videos
  • Secondary color correction: Detailed editing of individual hues
  • Includes high-quality special effects, cinematic transitions and templates
  • Export directly to DVD, Blu-ray Disc, YouTube, Facebook, Vimeo or as a file

New to this version:


New user interface
Pioneering design for efficient video editing: The new user interface from MAGIX Movie Edit Pro 2015 Plus greatly improves the program's operation - on all monitor sizes.

Native 64-bit application
Video editing without any limits: MAGIX Movie Edit Pro 2015 Plus takes full advantage of your computer's RAM and processors through its native 64-bit support.

NewBlue Titler EX Plug-in
Create exciting title animations, on-screen text and cinematic closing credits straight from Hollywood with NewBlue Titler EX directly in Movie Edit Pro 2015 Plus.

MultiCam editing for 4 cameras
Simultaneously edit up to 4 camera in realtime. The individual settings are adjusted automatically for you based on the audio data.

The new Movie Wizard
The professional templates from the new automated Movie Wizard provide a high-quality film look - ideal for many popular occasions and events.

Automatic fisheye distortion correction
Automatically correct optical distortions in your recordings with Movie Edit Pro 2015 Plus – perfect for any action or video camera!

Wireless project transfer
With Movie Edit Pro 2015 Plus you can transfer your mobile video projects from the free app Movie Edit Touch to your PC over Wi-Fi - including all media files. 

Edit XAVCS video files
The new XAVCS video format is used in many current camera models and supports recordings with a resolution of up to 4096 × 2304 pixels. Simply load the footage into your project and start editing.

Automatic loudness adjustment
Does the background music in your video have different volume levels?  Movie Edit Pro 2015 Plus can automatically adjust the loudness of the songs and even out the volume - no more problems with tracks that are too loud or too quiet!

Improved object editing
It's now even easier to cut out, insert or move movie objects. Every change made to movie objects is automatically taken into account in all mouse modes.
